comments: Previous name was: A simple grammar.
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 760
formula: From _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 28 2008: (Start)E.g.f. satisfies: A(x*(1 + log(1-x))) = 1/(1 + log(1-x)).E.g.f. satisfies: A(x) = 1/(1 + log(1 - x*A(x))).E.g.f.: A(x) = (1/x)*Series_Reversion[x + x*log(1-x)]. (End)a(n)=sum(k=0..n, binomial(n+k,n)*k!*sum(j=0..k, (-1)^(n+j)/(k-j)!*sum(i=0..j, stirling1(n,j-i)/i!)))/(n+1); [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, May 09 2013]a(n) ~ n^(n-1) * c^n / (sqrt(1+c) * exp(n) * (c-1)^(2*n+1)), where c = LambertW(exp(2)) = 1.5571455989976114... - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 08 2014
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
extensions: New name using e.g.f., _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 08 2014
